title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Access to Disability Equipment
purpose: To provide a forum for parliamentarians to engage with individuals living with disabilities, patient advocates, charities and equipment providers. To promote understanding of the importance and impact that the provision of specialist equipment can have on the individual and society, and encourage dialogue on the barriers preventing timely access.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 5278.
contact_details.secretariat: Tendo Consulting acts as the group's secretariat.https://tendoconsulting.co.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Tendo Consulting is paid by the British Healthcare Trades Association and Newlife to act as the group's secretariat. From : 14/05/2025 To  : 13/05/2026
